snippet: The experimental drug ofatumumab would bolster the Swiss pharmaceutical company’s portfolio of multiple sclerosis treatments.
abstract: Novartis agrees to buy multiple sclerosis drug ofatumumab, sold under the name Arzerra, from GlaxoSmithKline for up to $1 billion.

byline.original: By AMIE TSANG and ANDREW POLLACK

lead_paragraph: The experimental drug ofatumumab would bolster the Swiss pharmaceutical company’s portfolio of multiple sclerosis treatments.

headline.main: Novartis to Buy Multiple Sclerosis Drug From Glaxo
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Novartis Buys Glaxo Multiple Sclerosis Drug
